sources.description:
PizzaFLIX Presents CLASSIC MOVIE MONDAY
Stars: Norma Shearer, Robert Montgomery, Lewis Stone
Director: E. Mason Hopper

Discover a pre-Code romantic drama from the dawn of the sound era that captures the emotional complexity of family, love, and loyalty with the grace and glamour of early Hollywood.

The film stars Norma Shearer in one of her earliest talking roles, delivering a critically praised performance that earned her an Academy Award nomination. She‚Äôs joined by Robert Montgomery, in his film debut, along with Belle Bennett and Helene Millard. Their powerful portrayals bring depth and tension to a story about a young woman caught between her parents' divorce and her own unexpected romance.

Are you a PizzaFLIX Fanatic? Join our exclusive Fan Club for dedicated Classic movie lovers: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCE34fwgW7kWr7tc7YiOWtRw/join

Noted for its elegant production values, art direction, and early use of synchronized sound, this film reflects MGM‚Äôs high standards during a pivotal moment in cinematic history. An essential watch for classic film enthusiasts and fans of Golden Age Hollywood.
